articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Rupee gains 7 paise to close at 77.98 against US dollar
articles.description: On Monday, the rupee gained 7 paise versus the US dollar, settling at 77.98 (provisional) against the greenback as crude oil prices fell from their highs. However, forex dealers said that unabated foreign fund outflows limited the rupee#39;s appreciation bias.
